# elizaos-plugins/registry Daily Update (Feb 16, 2026)
## OVERVIEW 
The day's development focused on continuous integration improvements, with a new pull request opened to address a specific issue with Claude review on fork PRs.

- **CI/CD Enhancements**: A new pull request, [#260](https://github.com/elizaos-plugins/registry/pull/260), was opened to fix an issue with the Claude review process on pull requests originating from forks.
